Instruction: Combine rice and water in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Lower the heat to medium-low, cover, and let it simmer until the rice is cooked and the water is fully absorbed, about 20 to 25 minutes. Let the rice rest, covered, for approximately 10 minutes.
Combine the salsa and black beans in a microwave-safe bowl, then heat in the microwave on high until heated through, approximately 2 minutes, stirring once or twice while cooking.
Spoon the cooked rice into separate serving bowls.
Layer the rice with the black bean mixture, chicken strips, and Cheddar cheese; decorate with fresh cilantro and spoonfuls of sour cream.
